name: Shortcut Cab
description:
Take passengers to where they need to go as fast as possible.

Buy upgrades at a garage to get there faster.

Controls (Rebindable)

WASD - Drive

Shift - Drift

Click - Grappling Hook

Space - Rocket

Credits

Bread/jul2040 - Programming and Music

LynxOfUndyin477 - 3D Art

LittleEzra009 - 2D Art

Sound Effects

Engine Sound - https://freesound.org/people/margaridafragata/sounds/508650/

Tire Sound - https://freesound.org/people/audible-edge/sounds/71739/

Rocket Sound - https://freesound.org/people/NickTimesAudio/sounds/494827/

Grappling Hook Sound - https://freesound.org/people/16bitstudios/sounds/541975/

Crash Sound - Bread/jul2040
